title: Behind The Idea #63: Boeing's Changed Trajectory
description:
Boeing (BA) is in the news for all the wrong reasons. In light of the Ethiopian Airlines crash, businesses, travelers, and governments have raised concerns and doubts about the company, and its strong moat and ongoing rise as a business has fallen into doubt as a result. Investors have been trying to work out the impact this might have on the stock. 

We discuss whether Boeing's moat is as strong as it seems, whether its ex ante valuation made sense, and where the stock might head from here.
itunes:title: Boeing's Changed Trajectory
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: The recent 737 MAX crash will have an impact on Boeing, but how big will it be?
